ygData.subject: "What is Thought?"
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Just thought I would recommend What is thought? by Eric Baum.  I came to it quite sceptical, and whilst I don t now completely accept everything he says,

Hi,
	Just thought I would recommend "What is thought?" by Eric Baum.  I came to 
it quite sceptical, and whilst I don't now completely accept everything he 
says, I did get a useful perspective from reading it.  In particular, he 
has a couple of ideas which differ from the standard ANN baseline concepts 
and which are worth consideration.  That and he brings the computer science 
theory into a nice natural evolution perspective -- which is my main 
interest -- and brought up one major view which I had never considered.

	This is a home site he has for the book.  Not sure the reviews really tell 
you that much but the extracts told me enough that I bought it and there's 
links to the usual suppliers.  It's also not at all expensive...

	http://whatisthought.com/

	I'm not affiliated with him in any way.  We did exchange the some emails 
after I read his earlier papers.

	Ian Badcoe

Also, if you hold the cover up in a bright light and move it in a small 
circle it really makes you dizzy -- so what do you have to lose?
